timeline.message: add el-4.0 jakarta feature and api
add el-4.0 jakarta feature and api
add el-4.0 jakarta feature and api
change servlet 5 symbolic bundle name to jakartaee; update servlet-5.0/resources/l10n descriptions

timeline.bodyText: Can you make this  kind=noship for now?
timeline.author: cbridgha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+-include= ~${workspace}/cnf/resources/bnd/feature.props
